title: Income Restricted 2-Bed – Priced Well Below Market Prices
posting_body: ['Avenir - Boston MA', 'REDUCED PRICE: $1,664/Month ♦ 2-Bed/1-Bath ♦ 60% AMI', 'Please visit our website for income restrictions:', '<URL>', 'This is not a Lottery.', 'Avenir in Boston is a cornerstone of the revitalized Bulfinch Triangle Historic District, a vibrant neighborhood home to great restaurants, shops, and outdoor markets.', 'The property is also located just steps from North Station with fast and convenient access to multiple transportation options.', "Avenir's smoke-free studio, one and two-bedroom apartments feature smart home technology, granite, stainless steel finishes, and luxurious baths.", 'On-site amenities include a rooftop deck with stunning panoramic views, a state-of-the-art fitness center, above-ground indoor parking, and bicycle storage.', 'Amenities & Features', 'Package Service ♦ Controlled Access ♦ Maintenance on site ♦ Property Manager on Site ♦', 'Concierge ♦ Elevator ♦ Lounge ♦ Fitness Center ♦ Sundeck ♦', 'Location', '101 CANAL ST,', 'Boston MA, 02114', 'Actual floor plans of available vacancies may vary.', ' You will be provided the actual floor of the available apartment if we reach you on the waitlist.', 'Frequently Asked Questions:', '♦', 'Will the affordable units be able to rent parking?', ' If so, garage or off street and how much per month?', 'Not included in rent, additional monthly rental cost', '♦', 'What utilities are the renters responsible for?', 'Tenants are responsible for all utilities.', 'Additional Information', 'Maximum of 2 pets per unit.', 'There is a fee of:', 'Cat: $75 per month', 'Dog: $75 per month.', 'Breed restrictions apply.']
